titleInfo.title: ‘File 15/42 Government Servants’ Applications for Posts (Central Services) Rules, 1943.’

physicalDescription.extent: File papers are arranged chronologically. They are followed by file notes (folio 3).

Foliation: numbered 1-4. The numbering is written in pencil in the top right corner of the folio. The numbering starts at the front of the file, on the first file enclosure (f 1) and ends on the inside cover at the back of the file (f 5). The front file cover is unnumbered.

mods.abstract: The file contains one main document that was circulated to the Political Agent, Bahrain and others, for information and guidance in 1944. It is a letter of notification, dated 8 December 1943, from the Government of India Home Department, New Delhi to all its departments at home and overseas. It contains an announcement about the new Government Servants’ Applications for Posts (Central Services) Rules, 1943. These replaced the 1934 Rules, regarding the eligibility of existing Government of India employees to apply for and transfer to a post in another department of the Central Government, or a department or office under the control of a Crown Representative, Provincial Government or Chief Commissioner.
